Desc.entry: A social enterprise providing a gardening service working with people with special needs and/or learning disabilities, growing and selling food. Suitable for groups who may be looking for supported work experience and might benefit from energetic outdoor activity. As part of the work experience offers teaching in literacy. Based in Stocksbridge but able to work in other parts of the city. Offers free taster days and willing to meet with families, carers and other professionals who may be interested in using the serivce. There is a charge for this service which can be met through entitlement to individual budgets/direct payments.
